mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, company_id, process_code, process_instance_id, process_title, process_create_time, process_finish_time, process_status, process_result, form_value_company, form_value_type, form_value_user_id, form_value_user_name, form_value_rule, form_value_score, form_value_reason, create_time, modify_time, deleted, task_instance_id,is_inservice
mapper.select: select tsr.id , tsr.user_id , tsr.user_name, tsr.process_instance_id , COALESCE(tsd.dept_ids,'') as "deptList", tsr.company_id , tsr.task_instance_id, tsr.form_value_user_id FROM t_examine_action tsr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tsd2.examine_instance_id, string_agg (CAST(tsd2.dept_id AS VARCHAR), ',') dept_ids FROM t_examine_department tsd2 WHERE tsd2.deleted = 0 GROUP BY tsd2.examine_instance_id ) tsd ON tsr.id = tsd.examine_instance_id WHERE tsr.company_id = #{companyId} and tsr.task_instance_id = #{taskInstanceId} and tsr.deleted = 0 AND tsd.dept_ids !='' AND tsr.form_value_user_id !=''
